content.body: question that came up internally recently: does anyone have any idea why in https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/numbers-and-dates.html#sec-math.hypot, the infinite special case takes precedence NaN special case?

shu: seems like it may have been a precision concern?

i see a nan mention in the sept-17 one
